query.description: @RegionLock("Lock is this protects Region")

ad-hoc.query: SELECT DISTINCT LCO.PACKAGENAME "Package__('@PK')", LCO.CLASSNAME "Class", LCO.CLASSCODE "Class__(icon)", F.FIELDNAME "Field__|" FROM FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET FIL INNER JOIN OBJECT LO ON LO.ID = FIL.LOCK AND LO.ID = FIL.RECEIVER INNER JOIN OBJECT LCO ON LCO.ID = LO.TYPE INNER JOIN FIELD F ON F.ID = FIL.FIELD

SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(CAST (FLCO.PACKAGENAME || '.' || FLCO.CLASSNAME || '-' || CAST (FIL.LOCK AS CHAR (50)) AS CHAR (200))) "Dynamic Lock Id", CO.PACKAGENAME "Package__|('@PK')", CO.CLASSNAME "Class", CO.CLASSCODE "Class__(icon)", F.FIELDNAME "Field" FROM FIELDINSTANCELOCKSET FIL INNER JOIN OBJECT O ON O.ID = FIL.RECEIVER INNER JOIN OBJECT CO ON CO.ID = O.TYPE INNER JOIN FIELD F ON F.ID = FIL.FIELD INNER JOIN OBJECT FLO ON FLO.ID = FIL.LOCK INNER JOIN OBJECT FLCO ON FLCO.ID = FLO.TYPE ORDER BY 1,2,3,4

query.description: A new query

ad-hoc.query: SELECT * FROM LOCKSHELD

query.description: How often is a lock held when this field is accessed in this thread?

ad-hoc.query:
-- META-BEGIN(no-rows) -- No locks are ever held when this field is accessed -- META-END -- META-BEGIN(doc) --

-- How often is a lock held when this field is accessed after object construction in this thread? --

--

-- Lists how often each lock was held when this particular field was -- accessed after the object was fully constructed. If the same lock -- is held on every access, we have an assurance that no race condition -- was observed for this field. This is generally the more useful form -- of this query, as a safely published field usually doesn't need to -- have the same lock held during object construction as is held when -- it is accessed. -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
Displayed asTable
ColumnsLockA lock identifier
Times AcquiredThe number of times this lock was acquired and held -- while this field was accessed
Field Access CountThe number of times this field was accessed
Percentage HeldThe proportion of times a lock was held when this field -- was accessed to the total number of accesses, expressed as a -- percentage
--

--

Example

-- -- -- --

--The above example lists all of the locks that access this instance of --f_location, ordered by the percent of all field accesses --the lock was held for. The most commonly held lock was --ReentrantReadWriteLock-1272, which was held 10 out of the --12 times this instance of f_location was accessed after the --containing object was fully initialized. --

-- META-END SELECT '?Instance?' "Instance", '?Instance (Image)?' "Instance__(icon)", '?Field?' "Field", '?Field (Image)?' "Field__(icon)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS.COUNT AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "% Held__(suffix '%')(r)", LOCKS.LOCKID "Lock__('lock.gif')", LOCKS.COUNT "Accesses With Lock Held__(add-commas)(r)", ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "Total Accesses__(add-commas)(r)", LOCKS.LOCK "Lock__(hide)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "LOCKID", LOCK, COUNT(LOCK) "COUNT" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread? AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread? AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS ACCESSES ORDER BY 5 DESC

query.description: How often is a lock held when this field is accessed?

ad-hoc.query:
-- META-BEGIN(no-rows) -- No locks are ever held when this field is accessed -- META-END -- META-BEGIN(doc) --

-- How often is a lock held when this field is accessed after object construction? --

--

-- Lists how often each lock was held when this particular field was -- accessed after the object was fully constructed. If the same lock -- is held on every access, we have an assurance that no race condition -- was observed for this field. This is generally the more useful form -- of this query, as a safely published field usually doesn't need to -- have the same lock held during object construction as is held when -- it is accessed. -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
Displayed asTable
ColumnsLockA lock identifier
Times AcquiredThe number of times this lock was acquired and held -- while this field was accessed
Field Access CountThe number of times this field was accessed
Percentage HeldThe proportion of times a lock was held when this field -- was accessed to the total number of accesses, expressed as a -- percentage
--

--

Example

-- -- -- --

--The above example lists all of the locks that access this instance of --f_location, ordered by the percent of all field accesses --the lock was held for. The most commonly held lock was --ReentrantReadWriteLock-1272, which was held 10 out of the --12 times this instance of f_location was accessed after the --containing object was fully initialized. --

-- META-END SELECT '?Instance?' "Instance", '?Instance (Image)?' "Instance__(icon)", '?Field?' "Field", '?Field (Image)?' "Field__(icon)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS.COUNT AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "% Held__(suffix '%')(r)", LOCKS.LOCKID "Lock__('lock.gif')", LOCKS.COUNT "Accesses With Lock Held__(add-commas)(r)", ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "Total Accesses__(add-commas)(r)", LOCKS.LOCK "Lock__(hide)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "LOCKID", LOCK , COUNT(LOCK) "COUNT" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? AND A.UNDERCONSTRUCTION = 'N') AS ACCESSES ORDER BY 5 DESC

query.description: How often is a lock held when this object is indirectly accessed?

ad-hoc.query:
-- META-BEGIN(no-rows) -- No locks are ever held when this field is indirectly accessed -- META-END -- META-BEGIN(doc) --

-- How often is a lock held when this object is indirectly accessed? --

--

-- Lists how often each lock was held when a particular object was -- indirectly accessed, as well as what proportion of the total number -- of accesses that represents. -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
Displayed asTable
ColumnsLockA lock identifier
Times AcquiredThe number of times this lock was acquired and held -- while this object was indirectly accessed
Access CountThe number of times this object was indirectly -- accessed
Percentage HeldThe proportion of times a lock was held when this -- object was indirectly accessed to the total number of -- accesses, expressed as a percentage
--

-- --

Example

-- --

--The above example shows the two locks that were held when this was --object was indirectly accessed. Object-523 was held 99 out --of 100 times this object was called, and likely protects the object's state. --

-- META-END SELECT LOCKS.*, ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "Access Count__(add-commas)(r)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS."Times Acquired__(add-commas)(r)" AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "% Held__(suffix '%')(r)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "Lock__('lock.gif')(r)", LOCK "Lock__(hide)", COUNT(LOCK) "Times Acquired__(add-commas)(r)" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM INDIRECTACCESS A, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver? UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM INDIRECTACCESS A, INDIRECTACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM INDIRECTACCESS A WHERE A.RECEIVER = ?Receiver?) AS ACCESSES

query.description: How often is a lock held when this static field is accessed in this thread?

ad-hoc.query:
-- META-BEGIN(no-rows) -- No locks are ever held when this field is accessed -- META-END -- META-BEGIN(doc) --

-- How often is a lock held when this field is accessed in this thread? --

--

-- Lists how often each lock was held when this particular field was -- accessed, as well as what proportion of the total number of field -- accesses that represents. If the same lock is held on every access, -- we have an assurance that no race condition was observed for this -- field. -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
Displayed asTable
ColumnsLockA lock identifier
Times AcquiredThe number of times this lock was acquired and held -- while this field was accessed
Field Access CountThe number of times this field was accessed
Percentage HeldThe proportion of times a lock was held when this field -- was accessed to the total number of accesses, expressed as a -- percentage
--

-- --

Example

-- --

--The above example lists all of the locks that access the static field --copyComponents, ordered by the percentage of all field --accesses the lock was held for. ArrayList-12 was held --every time copyComponents was accessed. --

-- META-END SELECT '?Instance?' "Instance", '?Instance (Image)?' "Instance__(icon)", '?Field?' "Field", '?Field (Image)?' "Field__(icon)", CAST (((CAST (LOCKS.COUNT AS FLOAT)) / (CAST (ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT AS FLOAT))) * 100 AS DECIMAL) "% Held__(suffix '%')(r)", LOCKS.LOCKID "Lock__('lock.gif')", LOCKS.COUNT "Accesses With Lock Held__(add-commas)(r)", ACCESSES.ACCESSCOUNT "Total Accesses__(add-commas)(r)", LOCKS.LOCK "Lock__(hide)" FROM (SELECT OBJID(LOCK) "LOCKID", LOCK, COUNT(LOCK) "COUNT" FROM (SELECT L.LOCK FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCK L WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread? AND L.ID = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? UNION ALL SELECT LH.LOCKHELD "LOCK" FROM ACCESS A, ACCESSLOCKSHELD ALH, LOCKSHELD LH WHERE ALH.ACCESS = A.ID AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread? AND LH.LOCKEVENT = ALH.LASTACQUISITION AND A.FIELD = ?FieldId? ) AS FOO GROUP BY LOCK) AS LOCKS, (SELECT COUNT(*) "ACCESSCOUNT" FROM ACCESS A WHERE A.FIELD = ?FieldId? AND A.INTHREAD = ?Thread?) AS ACCESSES ORDER BY 5 DESC
